resources.string: How to Design a Home That Loves You Back?
On the title of each section, you could press the play button to let me read for you.
And during my reading, you could always mute me by pressing the stop button on the bottom of the page
Chapter 1 Object and Human, Home and Human
1.3.1 Humans loves a home as a large object or a collection of personal objects
1.3.2 Homes are objects and collections of personal objects evoking people\'s senses.
Chapter 2 Techno-object and Human - Towards further intimate relationships between humans and objects
2.1 Techno-object (object with anthropomorphic technologies) and techno-animism
2.2 Anthropomorphic technologies: computer science and artificial intelligence
2.2.1 The psychological reasons for basic computers and artificial intelligence creating an illusion as living beings
2.2.2 Objects with basic computers generate interactions with humans.
2.2.3 Objects with artificial intelligence achieve social interactions with humans.
2.2.4 Emotion AI and sensors: enhancing the social interactions between techno-objects and humans
2.3 Anthropomorphic technologies: human-robot interactions and physical expressions
2.3.1 Familiar appearance (virtual and physcal) and facial expressions (virtual and physical)
2.3.2 Body movement (virtual and physical) and physical touch (physical)
3.1 Speculation: A caring home with anthropomorphic technologies
